title: Transfer of all lands included in the CDS to a legal entity (e
clause_text: Transfer of all lands included in the CDS to a legal entity (e.g: Registered Society or Company, Co-operative Housing Society, Charitable Trust, etc.) to be created by the Promoter for implementing the CDS where different landholders have stakes proportionate to their share in the total land under CDS; or
